alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 30 at 1:38PM EDT until March 30 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHERN KENTUCKY INTO PARTS OF SOUTHERN OHIO... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHERN KENTUCKY INTO SOUTHWEST OHIO... The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect until 8 PM EDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 071 Warren, Fire Weather Zone 077 Hamilton, Fire Weather Zone 090 Gallatin, Fire Weather Zone 091 Boone, Fire Weather Zone 092 Kenton, Fire Weather Zone 093 Campbell, Fire Weather Zone 094 Owen, Fire Weather Zone 095 Grant and Fire Weather Zone 096 Pendleton. * WINDS...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Avoid burning. Conditions are favorable for rapid fire growth.
